description:
Amelda dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat, a mechanical menace that’s not only armed with countless cannons but can also summon a battalion of Robot Tokens!  How can Kaiba defeat an endless rank of robots, much less a monster the size of the plane itself?  He’s running out of time to think of a plan - the plane is minutes away from crashing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le vol de la peur - 2e partie
天空の要塞 ジグラート
